titles.title: Fire Fighter Higher Education Incentive Act of 2007
To provide loan forgiveness under the Federal Perkins Loan program for Federal, State, and local firefighters.

bill.summary: 11/9/2007--Introduced. Fire Fighter Higher Education Incentive Act of 2007 - Amends title IV (Student Assistance) of the Higher Education Act of 1965 to cancel the Perkins loans of full-time federal, state, and local fire fighters.
